title: The Death of Art Bell - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/13/18
itunes:title: The Death of Art Bell - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/13/18
description:
George Noory, guest host Dave Schrader, long time Coast to Coast guest Whitley Streiber and an open lines caller share their memories of show founder Art Bell, who passed away Friday evening at the age of 72.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
